name: reldif

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1))), wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1)))
-| wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0)
-| wi(wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0), wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1)))
-| wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0)
-| wi(wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0), wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1))))

|- wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1)))
-| wi(wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0), wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1))))

body.origin: |- wi(wss(cdif(c0, c1), c0), wi(wrel(c0), wrel(cdif(c0, c1))))

comment: A difference cutting down a relation is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 31-Mar-1998.)
